ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have given all kinds of examples to people in this Qur'an, so that hopefully they will pay heed -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have given examples of every kind for men in this Qur'an so that they may contemplate:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have indeed propounded for mankind all kinds of parables in this Qur'an that they may take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have given all kinds of examples for the human being in this Quran so that perhaps he may take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have indeed illustrated examples of all kinds in this Qur’an, so that they may ponder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We have put forth for men, in this Qur'an every kind of parable in order that they may remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We have set forth to men in this Quran similitudes of every sort that they may mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed We have struck for the people in this Koran every manner of similitude; haply they will remember;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily We have coined for mankind in this Qur'an all kinds of similitudes, that haply they may reflect;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have set forth to men all kinds of parables in this Quran so that they may take heed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have propounded for mankind in this Qur'an all kinds of similitudes, that haply they may be admonished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We have drawn for mankind in this Quran every [kind of] example, so that they may take admonition:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have put forth for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable, in order that they may receive admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We have put forth for men, in this Quran every kind of similitude in order that they may remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We have struck of every manner of parable for mankind in this Koran in order that they will remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have cited in this Quran for mankind every ideal, that they may take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:27] And verily We have struck, coined, for mankind in this Qur’ān every [kind of] similitude, that perhaps they may remember, [that perhaps] they may be admonished —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily We have coined for mankind) We exposited for people (in this Qur'an all kinds of similitudes, that haply they may reflect) that haply they may take heed;
